swfscAirDAS 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • AirDAS format

Summarize aerial DAS effort

Source: R/airdas_effort.R
airdas_effort.Rd

Summarize aerial DAS data by effort segments

airdas_effort(
  das.df,
  seg.km,
  sp.codes,
  randpicks.load = NULL,
  randpicks.save = NULL
)

Arguments

das.df

data frame; processed aerial DAS data output from airdas_process (or subsequent airdas function)
seg.km

numeric; length of effort segments
sp.codes

character; species codes to include in segdata (and siteinfo?)
randpicks.load

character; file to run read.csv on and pass output to airdas_effort_chop TODO
randpicks.save

character; if not

Value

List of segdata, siteinfo, and randpicks data frames

Details

Todo

"continuous effort sections" and "modeling segments"

Filters for events where OnEffort is TRUE

Continuous effort sections ID'd by T and R events

Uses distance, method = "vincenty" to calculate distance (in km) between events (lat/lon points)

Describe segdata, siteinfo, and randpicks

Examples

y <- system.file("airdas_sample.das", package = "swfscAirDAS")

y.proc <- airdas_process(y)
airdas_effort(y.proc, 3, sp.codes = c("mn", "bm"))

y.rand <- system.file("airdas_sample_randpicks.csv", package = "swfscAirDAS")
airdas_effort(
  y.proc, 3, sp.codes = c("mn", "bm"), randpicks.load = y.rand
)
